p: While we acknowledge the entanglements and shared similarities between CM and MR[ [such as loss of sense of place, identity, land, culture, and ancestral ties] (Mortreux and Barnett, 2009, Black et al., 2013, Huang, 2018, Heslin et al., 2019), as well as the debate about whether both are forms of adaptation or maladaptation (Kartiki, 2011, Arnall, 2019), we do not focus on such issues. Our aim in this paper is to disentangle the relationship between CM and MR by offering six propositions.
